project.title: ai-blog-generator-interview-TushinKulshreshtha
project.summary:
**Project Overview:**
An AI-powered blog content generation system that combines automated daily posting with on-demand content creation. This Flask-based application leverages OpenAI's GPT models to produce SEO-optimized blog posts from simple keywords, featuring both a user-friendly web interface and automated scheduling capabilities.

**Key Features:**
* Instant blog post generation from single keywords with AI-powered content creation
* Automated daily content scheduling system for consistent posting
* SEO optimization with integrated metrics and affiliate link support
* Responsive web interface with markdown-to-HTML conversion
* Persistent storage of all generated content in markdown format

**Technologies Used:**
Python, Flask, OpenAI GPT API, HTML/CSS, Markdown, Environment Variables (.env), Scheduling System

**Impact & Benefits:**
This solution dramatically reduces content creation time while maintaining high-quality, SEO-optimized output. It enables content creators and marketers to maintain consistent posting schedules and generate monetizable content without the traditional time investment of manual writing, making it particularly valuable for digital marketing professionals and content creators.

The portfolio summary above captures the essence of this sophisticated blog generation system while highlighting its most impressive technical features and practical benefits. The project demonstrates strong full-stack development skills, API integration, and automated content management capabilities.
